00064 #if (TIMER_COUNT == 1)
00065 #define TIMER_REF_VALID(ref)    ((ref) == TIMER0)
00066 #elif (TIMER_COUNT == 2)
00067 #define TIMER_REF_VALID(ref)    (((ref) == TIMER0) || ((ref) == TIMER1))
00068 #elif (TIMER_COUNT == 3)
00069 #define TIMER_REF_VALID(ref)    (((ref) == TIMER0)    \
00070                                  || ((ref) == TIMER1) \
00071                                  || ((ref) == TIMER2))
00072 #elif (TIMER_COUNT == 4)
00073 #define TIMER_REF_VALID(ref)    (((ref) == TIMER0)    \
00074                                  || ((ref) == TIMER1) \
00075                                  || ((ref) == TIMER2) \
00076                                  || ((ref) == TIMER3))
00077 #else
00078 #error "Undefined number of timers."
00079 #endif
00080 
00082 #if defined(_SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1)
00083 #define TIMER_CH_VALID(ch)    ((ch) < 3)
00084 #elif defined(_SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2)
00085 #define TIMER_CH_VALID(ch)    ((ch) < 4)
00086 #else
00087 #error "Unknown platform. Undefined number of channels."
00088 #endif

00316 #if defined(TIMER_CTRL_X2CNT) && defined(TIMER_CTRL_ATI)
00317 #define TIMER_INIT_DEFAULT                                                            \
00318 {                                                                                     \
00319   true,                   /* Enable timer when init complete. */                      \
00320   false,                  /* Stop counter during debug halt. */                       \
00321   timerPrescale1,         /* No prescaling. */                                        \
00322   timerClkSelHFPerClk,    /* Select HFPER clock. */                                   \
00323   false,                  /* Not 2x count mode. */                                    \
00324   false,                  /* No ATI. */                                               \
00325   timerInputActionNone,   /* No action on falling input edge. */                      \
00326   timerInputActionNone,   /* No action on rising input edge. */                       \
00327   timerModeUp,            /* Up-counting. */                                          \
00328   false,                  /* Do not clear DMA requests when DMA channel is active. */ \
00329   false,                  /* Select X2 quadrature decode mode (if used). */           \
00330   false,                  /* Disable one shot. */                                     \
00331   false                   /* Not started/stopped/reloaded by other timers. */         \
00332 }
00333 #else
00334 #define TIMER_INIT_DEFAULT                                                            \
00335 {                                                                                     \
00336   true,                   /* Enable timer when init complete. */                      \
00337   false,                  /* Stop counter during debug halt. */                       \
00338   timerPrescale1,         /* No prescaling. */                                        \
00339   timerClkSelHFPerClk,    /* Select HFPER clock. */                                   \
00340   timerInputActionNone,   /* No action on falling input edge. */                      \
00341   timerInputActionNone,   /* No action on rising input edge. */                       \
00342   timerModeUp,            /* Up-counting. */                                          \
00343   false,                  /* Do not clear DMA requests when DMA channel is active. */ \
00344   false,                  /* Select X2 quadrature decode mode (if used). */           \
00345   false,                  /* Disable one shot. */                                     \
00346   false                   /* Not started/stopped/reloaded by other timers. */         \
00347 }
00348 #endif

00397 #define TIMER_INITCC_DEFAULT                                                 \
00398 {                                                                            \
00399   timerEventEveryEdge,      /* Event on every capture. */                    \
00400   timerEdgeRising,          /* Input capture edge on rising edge. */         \
00401   timerPRSSELCh0,           /* Not used by default, select PRS channel 0. */ \
00402   timerOutputActionNone,    /* No action on underflow. */                    \
00403   timerOutputActionNone,    /* No action on overflow. */                     \
00404   timerOutputActionNone,    /* No action on match. */                        \
00405   timerCCModeOff,           /* Disable compare/capture channel. */           \
00406   false,                    /* Disable filter. */                            \
00407   false,                    /* Select TIMERnCCx input. */                    \
00408   false,                    /* Clear output when counter disabled. */        \
00409   false                     /* Do not invert output. */                      \
00410 }

00473 
00475 #define TIMER_INITDTI_DEFAULT                                                \
00476 {                                                                            \
00477   true,                     /* Enable the DTI. */                            \
00478   false,                    /* CC[0|1|2] outputs are active high. */         \
00479   false,                    /* CDTI[0|1|2] outputs are not inverted. */      \
00480   false,                    /* No auto restart when debugger exits. */       \
00481   false,                    /* No PRS source selected. */                    \
00482   timerPRSSELCh0,           /* Not used by default, select PRS channel 0. */ \
00483   timerPrescale1,           /* No prescaling.  */                            \
00484   0,                        /* No rise time. */                              \
00485   0,                        /* No fall time. */                              \
00486   TIMER_DTOGEN_DTOGCC0EN|TIMER_DTOGEN_DTOGCDTI0EN, /* Enable CC0 and CDTI0 */\
00487   true,                     /* Enable core lockup as fault source */         \
00488   true,                     /* Enable debugger as fault source */            \
00489   false,                    /* Disable PRS fault source 0 */                 \
00490   timerPRSSELCh0,           /* Not used by default, select PRS channel 0. */ \
00491   false,                    /* Disable PRS fault source 1 */                 \
00492   timerPRSSELCh0,           /* Not used by default, select PRS channel 0. */ \
00493   timerDtiFaultActionInactive, /* No fault action. */                        \
00494 }
00495 #endif /* _TIMER_DTCTRL_MASK */

00517 {
00518   return timer->CC[ch].CCV;
00519 }

00603 /***************************************************************************/
00613 __STATIC_INLINE void TIMER_Enable(TIMER_TypeDef *timer, bool enable)
00614 {
00615   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER_REF_VALID(timer));
00616 
00617   if (enable)
00618   {
00619     timer->CMD = TIMER_CMD_START;
00620   }
00621   else
00622   {
00623     timer->CMD = TIMER_CMD_STOP;
00624   }
00625 }
00626

00629 void TIMER_InitCC(TIMER_TypeDef *timer,
00630                   unsigned int ch,
00631                   const TIMER_InitCC_TypeDef *init);
00632

00634 void TIMER_InitDTI(TIMER_TypeDef *timer, const TIMER_InitDTI_TypeDef *init);
00635 
00636 /***************************************************************************/
00646 __STATIC_INLINE void TIMER_EnableDTI(TIMER_TypeDef *timer, bool enable)
00647 {
00648   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER0 == timer);
00649 
00650   if (enable)
00651   {
00652     timer->DTCTRL |= TIMER_DTCTRL_DTEN;
00653   }
00654   else
00655   {
00656     timer->DTCTRL &= ~TIMER_DTCTRL_DTEN;
00657   }
00658 }
00659

00677   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER0 == timer);
00678   return timer->DTFAULT;
00679 }

00758 /***************************************************************************/
00772 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t TIMER_IntGet(TIMER_TypeDef *timer)
00773 {
00774   return timer->IF;
00775 }
00776 
00777 
00778 /***************************************************************************/
00797 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t TIMER_IntGetEnabled(TIMER_TypeDef *timer)
00798 {
00799   uint32_t tmp;
00800 
00801   /* Store TIMER->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00802    * of volatile accesses. */
00803   tmp = timer->IEN;
00804 
00805   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00806   return timer->IF & tmp;
00807 }
00808

00824 }
